Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-53213 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.64.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-53213 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.64.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kernel is earlier than 6.6.64.2-1, affected by CVE-2024-53213
